## initXRControllers() function

Prepare to load XR controller

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function initXRControllers(xr: THREE.WebXRManager, handContainer: THREE.Object3D): HandHolder;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  xr | THREE.WebXRManager | <code>renderer.xr</code> |
|  handContainer | THREE.Object3D | Where to add the XR Controller. |

[HandHolder](./three-xr-controller.handholder.md)
